Name: Average time from Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR to Request Payment
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total time between Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR and Request Payment across all successful reimbursement cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Minimum time it takes Request Payment to be performed after Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average duration of Request Payment activity compared to the duration of Payment Handled
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Request Payment and the end of the case

Name: Time elapsed from Request Payment to Payment Handled in variants that include both domestic declarations and pre-paid travel costs
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Request Payment' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total resolution time of Request Payment in variants that involve budget owner approval versus those that do not
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Minimum waiting time to Request Payment following Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Request Payment in cases with no rejections versus cases with at least one rejection
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average cycle time of Request Payment in the most frequent variant (Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE → Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION → Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR → Request Payment → Payment Handled)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total time between Request Payment and Payment Handled in variants where the supervisor also acts as budget owner
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Request Payment' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time for Request Payment to be executed after Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in domestic trip reimbursement cases
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average time it takes Request Payment to occur after the last approval step, distinguishing between single-approval and multi-approval paths
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Elapsed time between Request Payment and Payment Handled in variants that originate from pre-paid travel cost submissions versus post-trip reimbursements
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Request Payment' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Time from Request Payment to Payment Handled in cases processed entirely in 2018 compared to those processed in 2017
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'Request Payment'", 'end': "activity == 'Payment Handled'", 'aggregation': 'average', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
